First Post!

The latest update, 0.16, brought many new features, including the ability to venture outside your capsule and fly around using a personal RCS pack. That is, as long as you're not on Kerbin. The EVA pack has proved vital for going any sort of distance on one of Kerbin's moons on foot.

However, on Kerbin itself, the EVA pack is utterly useless. With its much higher gravity, the new RCS pack makes little to no noticible difference on the velocity of the Kerman.

This is all well and good, because there is no real need to travel very far on Kerbin by foot.

But, with the lingering idea of extraterrestrial planets (possibly ones of even more mass than Kerbin) in the Kerbol System, having an RCS pack capable of lifting the Kermen off the ground in higher "Gees" could prove necessary. My question is, in the 0.17 update, will there be more powerful EVA suits available to accommodate for the more intense gravity of other planets? Perhaps located in the "Crew" tab in the VAB?

I think the RCS pack is fine as it is. It is not designed for high gravity situation. It would be better to just get a few more parts designed for making rovers and etc. I think once .18+ comes out with docking and we can construct a second vehicles and attach it to our rocket then moving around planets wont be much of a problem.

Welcome to the forums, hopefully you dont get flamed to bad for this first post.

In my day we walked on the moon, and were happy with it! none of your fancy flying!

In all seriousness, the EVApak is fine as it is, (except for the infuriating control system), but I do think the ability to sprint on planets with about the same gravity as kerbin should be added. Obviously a planet with a much greater grav. pull you'd not be able to sprint on, but a little more or a little less, I'd say you'd still be able to sprint, after a fashion.

Or i wonder if walking around on a planet with enough gravity would hurt them D:
I really think rovers would be a better choice. The rovers from all those mod packs are already good enough.

I just hope they made a lot of these mod parts stock. It is one thing to say if a mod does it we dont need to do it but you see a lot of mods break with each release and more and more no one updates them. I would rather have a nice set of stock parts that are already updated on release.

I dont really think a jetpack would be that great of an idea though.
Personally, I'll be making a flying transport craft that is piloted from the cockpit view. If only we could generate fuel somehow... It would be very useful for small or long distance craft.

I'm pretty sure there's a mod for solar panels and a plug in to make them work.

I like the idea of EVA accessories, possibly even new suits.

For instance a flight suit for activities that don't involve deep space travel, like flying jets and things. Personally I think in the final game a flight suit should be the standard wear for a Kerbal when you strip him down out of his EVA suit. or a heavy, specially made suit for extreme environments like Charr or Eve's atmosphere. Plus other things like a Wingsuit or an attachable parachute. Who wouldn't want to go sky diving into the Mars planet's deep canyons?

What I'd like to see is a throttle slider for EVAPacks. Similar to how the engine throttle works, the Shift/Ctrl keys could be used to adjust the amount of thrust the thrusters exert. By default, it would be small (as it is now), but that should be perhaps 1/4 or so of the potential thrust. Lower setting should also be possible, so that (for example) on the smallest of the new moons coming up, the EVAPack won't cause you to be flung into escape trajectory.

I kind of adressed this in my Kerbal Outfitter idea, the link is at http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16820-Idea-Kerbal-Outfitter. I agree, landing on Eve would be a nightmare with the current packs.

I suggested basically the same thing but it was more a general equipment idea.

Yep. Look through the last few pages of this thread.

I don't think EVA packs need any change. I don't think they're intended to be powered packs for motion through atmospheres under regular gravity, rather for having fun in low-gravity/free fall environment.

What I'd like to see is a throttle slider for EVAPacks. Similar to how the engine throttle works, the Shift/Ctrl keys could be used to adjust the amount of thrust the thrusters exert.

Those keys are already taken! Shift is up, ctrl is down. If they were to boost the power in any way this would be needed though.
EVA packs aren't jet packs, guys. They're mainly supposed to be used for spacewalk maneuvering. It just so happens that on small bodies like Mun and Minmus, they work as jetpacks.

Shall we petition for jetpacks instead? I think so!

No game is complete without some sort of real jetpack
If anything, the EVA pack's thrust is going to be reduced, and a form of throttle added.

I do think, however, that it should be just powerful enough to barely lift you off the surface, or at least allow you to perform higher jumps.

What about... Roller skates! Would be great for getting around, and hilarious to watch. In fact you could use the EVA pack to maneuver! Sprinting isn't really fast enough, on the mun you can go like 50 m/s, sprinting on Kerbin is around 3 (I think)
